articles.title: Fears of a ‘twindemic’ recede as flu lies low - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: Despite the horrifying surge of COVID-19 cases and deaths in the United States right now, one bit of good news is emerging this winter: It looks unlikely that the country will endure a “twindemic” of both flu and the coronavirus at the same time.

articles.author: Ian Sample
articles.title: 'Autoantibodies' may be driving severe Covid cases, study shows - The Guardian
articles.description: Scientists find aberrant immune system in patients with virus could also be cause of ‘long Covid’
articles.content: Dramatic levels of friendly fire from the immune system may drive severe Covid-19 disease and leave patients with long Covid when medical problems persist for a significant time after the virus has b… [+2359 chars]
